sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO pi_topcomp ( SELECT T.TARGET_ID, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'), T.RRN, T.RRN_PRE, T.FOREIGNER, T.FOREIGNER_PRE, T.DRIVER, T.DRIVER_PRE, T.PASSPORT, T.PASSPORT_PRE, T.ACCOUNT_NUM, T.ACCOUNT_NUM_PRE, T.CARD_NUM, T.CARD_NUM_PRE, T.PHONE, T.PHONE_PRE, T.MERITZ_ACC, T.MERITZ_ACC_PRE, T.TOTAL, T.TOTAL_PRE, T.TOTAL_GAP FROM pi_topcomp T WHERE date(regdate) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM pi_topcomp T2 WHERE T2.TARGET_ID = T.TARGET_ID AND date(regdate) = CURDATE()))
